payment_guide.title: Payment Guide
payment_guide.desc: How to order and pay for products
payment_guide.support_msg: If you encounter any issues with payment or need further assistance, please contact our <1>Support</1>

step1.title: 1. Select Products
step1.content: Browse our shop and add the items you want to your shopping cart.

step2.title: 2. Check Your Cart
step2.content: Go to the cart page to review your items and total, or apply a discount code if you have one.

step3.title: 3. Choose Payment Method
step3.content: We offer various payment methods for your convenience, including Stripe (Credit Card), PromptPay, and Account Balance.

step4.title: 4. Confirm Payment
step4.content: After successful payment, the system will automatically process your order. You will receive your License Key immediately in the Dashboard.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our services
faq.no_answer_desc: If you cannot find the answer you are looking for, our team is always ready to help. Join our Discord or contact us via email.

scripts.q: Which frameworks do QR Studio scripts support?
scripts.a: Most of our scripts support both ESX and QB-Core, which is clearly stated in each product's details.

updates.q: Do purchased products get free updates?
updates.a: Yes! Once you purchase a product, you will receive lifetime updates for free through your Dashboard.

install.a: We provide detailed documentation for all products. If you encounter any installation issues, you can ask for help via Discord Support for free.

license_limit.q: How many servers can one License Key be used on?
license_limit.a: Typically, a License Key is tied to a single IP address. If you need to move or change the IP, you can do it yourself through the Dashboard according to the specified quota.

license_security.q: How does the license security system work?
license_security.a: We use an IP Whitelist system to verify usage rights and prevent unauthorized use of the scripts.

delivery.q: When will I receive my product after payment?
delivery.a: Our system is 100% automated. After successful payment, you will receive your License Key and download link immediately.

payment_methods.a: We support Stripe (Credit/Debit Card), PromptPay QR Code, and using your account balance.
